website_summaries.verdict: This diaper sprayer has a long hose that stays flexible even when it's in use, so you can spray exactly where you need to every time.
pros: Sprayer body made of corrosion-free polymer
Brass valve core and ceramic seals
Use thumb pressure to control splattering
cons: water still splatters at lowest setting

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, not the Knockoffs that look similar.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying one of the similar items during the great TP shortage and it leaked and was junk from overseas. This is a product assembled in the States and it is simple to install and has given me no problems with leaks. The company is great to deal with and were happy to be on the phone answering questions I had prior to my order. I am getting another one for my house and ditching TP forever. Quit walking around half clean, do yourself, and those around you, a favor and make the switch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Mostly plastic, original was mostly brass, description only mentions the sprayer heads being plastic
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was expecting the same product as my neighbors Aquaus 360 but apparently, when they increased the price from $25.78 to $59.95, they replaced the quality brass components with cheap plastic. I'm probably going to send this back, $59.95 is way too much for cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Idk why it asked me about softness. It's metal. So it gets one star for softness... anyways. We have had this for a year, moved and reinstalled it in new house. Never had issues with leaking. I dont use the cap. This thing is POWERFUL. If you're using the full strength idk what is wrong with you, and you're gonna have a mess to clean up because it will ricochet water off whatever you're spraying on the wall on full blast. I would probably pay more for this thing than what it's asking because all the reviews about leaking I see on other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hen255

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install, no tools required, wonderful water pressure, always turn off the valve after use and no worries, no leaks or issues here. Was thankful to have purchased this for cloth diapers but glad to have it during this pandemic as well for the country wide toilet paper shortage! Brings so much peace of mind! Gets all our diapers clean, love the adjustable pressure
customer_reviews.author: Rodney c burnette

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend is happy.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice for the instructions to be more specific. There was nothing on uninstalling/installing the different attachments. It would be far easier to not have any head attached, and allow the end user to choose what they want. My girlfriend is happy to have a bidet sprayer in "her" bathroom when she's here, so I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: music man

customer_reviews.title: No more using "plebe paper" like a barbarian.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months, and I haven't looked back after joining the rest of the civilized world with the latest in modern derriere pampering technology. Dead simple to install, was initially disappointed that the top half of head is silver plastic instead of metal, but it doesn't matter and overall this thing is high quality. Make sure to turn off water flow after each use so you don't wear out the o-ring. Also, make sure you give your girlfriend a brief tutorial so she doesn't accidentally clean your bathroom walls.
customer_reviews.author: Beeboo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install. Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: Only negative: if you live in climates where the water is cold out of the tap be prepared for an anal-pucker. Since I live in FL, where the water is as hot as people's temper in traffic, it works perfectly. It really is a very well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: IamAlex

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Installation
customer_reviews.text: I bought (2) for my household, soon going for a 3rd. Installed one at my mothers. Cousins purchased (2) for their household based on my recommendation. Thus far, they all love it. Not built for heavy duty use, but with proper care and handling it should last a good while. Easy installation and good user-friendly design. Definitely like the three extension sizes to choose from and variable water spray pressure. It can spoil you and will not go back to not having one.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo M. Salero

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a touchy subject. You're not going to talk about removing federal matter with the guys at work. On Amazon...who cares. I'll give u the condensed version. Works great, stays clean and reduces toilet paper dramatically. Why only 4 stars? The unit is designed well but it's made from plastic and the tubing looks industrial. I would pay extra for a SS spray want and more eloquent looking hose.
customer_reviews.author: Traderfjp

customer_reviews.title: Crap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because I was unable to install in my rental house. BIG downfall of this product. When I originally purchased one from my cloth diaper store, the sprayer was ALL METAL!! Now the sprayer is plastic!! Don’t waster your money on this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: For people who like being clean, and understand toilet paper really doesn't do the job, this is great. We always wanted a bidet, but no need with this. We did get the one with the extension and we're glad we did. This is very light so I think it is chrome plated plastic. Over time, it may not look that great (our holding bracket is too tight and lightly scratches the unit every time we put it up). Also, the hose is longer than it needs to be (for us) so it coils on the floor next to the toilet--not great looking, but only a minor issue. Five plus stars.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. I use them everyday to clean myself, dirty stained laundry, and to wash down the tub and shower for extra cleanliness in between cleanings. The company reached out to me to make sure everything was perfect and to reassure me that i will have a pleasant experience with their product as they stand behind it fully. I CANNOT RECOMMEND THIS ENOUGH
customer_reviews.author: Pizzaman

customer_reviews.title: Whoa...the power!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper sprayer. We had one at the cloth diaper store I worked at 2 yrs ago as well but I never owned one myself. It really is easy to install and very powerful! My only complaint is that its almost TOO powerful. Water gets everywhere! It bounces off the diaper...but then again you need the power to get the poo off...hmmmm. I definitely reccommend this sprayer to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Behrens

customer_reviews.title: As it was described by seller
customer_reviews.text: The very pricey japanese toilets I heard about that have programmable cleaning with hot air and no effort required while you are sitting down, caused me to buy this. This is very affordable and wasn't too difficult to install myself. Instructions point out do not clean or expose any part of this unit to bleach and/or ammonia it could cause the line to fail or degrade I like having this just in case I need it such as if I have another back injury or knee surgery and moving and twisting is really difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bidet! I thought it might be messy to use but it's not. I bought it to cut down on UTI's. Have just ordered another one for a friend who has a bad back and has difficulty wiping herself.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline P Harris

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, effective and convenient product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Unlike the bidet seats that sit on top of your toilet seat and take up a lot of space, and only spray where they are manufactured to spray, you can direct this where YOU want to spray, and you can easily adjust the volume. With the longer nozzle you can reach where you like. I love mine and have recommended it to my daughters and girl friends. Granted, it is a little cold in the winter, but like most people, I don't have a hot water line to my commode. ( you get used to that) But the rest of the year, especially hot summertime, it is most refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Wutzi Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness ahhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I really like it . Cleanliness is very important and this does the job . For some reason when we ordered it we thought it had 3 changeable heads on it. When we received ti we returned it thinking it was the less expensive one . Yet when we reordered it the same one arrived . I believe it was our error but the picture makes you think otherwise . Make sure you turn the valve off after use or you will be shot in the back with COLD water .( wake up call )
customer_reviews.author: Momscaboose

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Easy to install, no leaks, and easy to use. Great for spraying diapers, using as a bidet, and using post partum! Pressure can get really hi though, so just turn it on a little and slowly work up to the pressure you need.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great design! The handle is plastic but it's light weight and easy to hold while spraying from different angles. The valve is a plus since you don't have to worry about having to open the valve when you aren't planning to use the bidet/diper sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Bianey

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Install
customer_reviews.text: Made of metal, not plastic, installs in five minutes, does the job. Good bye TP. Wish the spray head put out a broader pattern.
customer_reviews.author: cadman_57

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sprayer. Spend the extra money to buy this Its definitely worth it. You need this sprayer for cloth diapering. It's better than those other sprayers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Falco

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but functional
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. All plastic construction. Must turn off under toilet after each use or it might explode. works great but plastic?
customer_reviews.author: B-row

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband install this to our toilet and heis so happy that is why I ordered 3 more
customer_reviews.author: Carmencita Vicencio

customer_reviews.title: Great but most parts are plastic. Valve is all steel.
customer_reviews.text: Great and very easy to install. The only issue is spray gets all over the place. I guess I have to get used to it. It is plastic which concerns me a little on weather it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: April Hill

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a while now and love it. I have recommended it to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now and love it. I have recommended it to my friends. Be careful of the power it packs.
customer_reviews.author: T Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Decent sprayer but not controllable as you may think.
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the flow of this is not controllable. It needs a screen not a spray nozzle. The water goes everywhere even at lowest setting. The plastic is really easy to break. Buy the brass one. Good fitting and contruction.
customer_reviews.author: Rick K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about it being made of plastic, but was very pleasantly surprised by the excellent build quality. This is the third bidet product I've tried and this one finally meets or exceeds all of my needs. I'm a very happy camper. UPDATE: I was so pleased with this product I ordered a second one for the RV. Craftsmanship is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: David Richards

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer works really good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer works really good. Easy to install, easy to use and out of the way when not in use. I would have given a 5 star if the valve handle was positioned correctly. The handle down should go with the flow. The handle down is in the off position, weird. The instructions did warn to turn off when not in use to protect the hose and prevent damage. Wish they could have made a stronger hose. Dont really want to tell guests if they take a dump and use the bidet to be sure and turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dashiell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Get the extension This unit puts ALL the toilet rings models to shame. Excellent quality and an intuitive flow control, Easy Peasy! Especially helpful for chronic illness sufferers and the elderly Wake Up America! Quit TP! Go Bidet!
customer_reviews.author: Know it Owl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. It is plastoc so it doesnt have the feel of metal. Yet for the price great pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Heafy

customer_reviews.title: No Leaks works great
customer_reviews.text: Quick install, about 5 - 10 minutes. No leaks, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lee M

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easily, seems to be of high quality construction and made in the USA. Works great as both a diaper sprayer and bidet. Great design also, certainly easier to use than many toilet sprayers that seem to be re-purposed kitchen sink sprayers!
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Very easy to install, simple to use and does the job. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olga in Ada

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for rinsing cloth diapers. It has a very powerful stream so there is a bit of a learning curve but it gets the job done. Would not want to attempt cloth diapers without this. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: brewcity77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed yet but it is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: sherah

customer_reviews.title: Cool product.
customer_reviews.text: This product work well. My wife really like it, she enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: SeeMeHere

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase I recommended it works very good
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase I recommended it works very good .
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Alavez

customer_reviews.title: it works great.
customer_reviews.text: No leaks! Adjustable flow. Even though it is not heated water, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy'sBUYS

customer_reviews.title: and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product is made of high quality materials, thoughtfully designed, and easy to install. Maybe a shorter hose length could be an option.
customer_reviews.author: Private Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to brake if you install so hard
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. Easy to use. My bottom has never felt so clean and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Older than the Hills

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Does not drip. Long handle makes it easier to reach the "far regions" - especially if your mobility or range is limited. The spray is controlled from a trickle to blast - leaving you in the driver's seat.
customer_reviews.author: parachutegirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product in the market, from installation to functionality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shalini

customer_reviews.title: A more civilized way to take care of business.
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustability of flow gives total control. The shut off valve works smoothly indicative of good quality. Using cold water seems like it would be harsh, but it's not a problem. I really like the strong spray you can dial up for the ultimate clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mincer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for BIG savings no need for T paper any more. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RinseWorks – Patented Aquaus 360 Diaper Sprayer - NSF Certified for Legal Installation - 3 Year Warranty – Dual Spray Pressure Controls – SafeSpray Valve Core, StayFlex Hose
feature_bullets: PLEASE WATCH THE AQUAUS 360 VIDEO in the product pictures to learn why the Aquaus 360 Diaper sprayer is the perfect solution to easily rinse messy cloth diapers, bedpans, potty seat bowls, under garments, food bibs, muddy shoes and many more of life’s messy moments.
INCLUDES - Patented ABS Polymer Sprayer – Brass T-Connector & Ball Valve – 54-inch Stainless Steel Hose - 2 ABS Spray Heads - 5’’ Extension - Tank Clip & Sprayer holder

MADE IN THE USA with domestic and global components. NSF Certified to UPC (Uniform Plumbing Code) for legal installation in the USA and Canada; includes 2 CSA/NSF certified plumbing code required back-flow preventers.

EZ THUMB PRESSURE CONTROLS allow you to easily adjust the spray pressure as you rinse messy cloth diapers, preventing splattering and overspray; pressure can also be set to any level while rinsing, making the sprayer very comfortable to hold and maneuver

NSF CERTIFIED Stay Flex stainless steel 54-in long high-pressure hose with solid brass hose nuts and double crimps on both ends; stays totally flexible during use. NSF Certified brass EZ-Reach shut-off valve and T-Connector with hand tight 7/8-in handgrip nut; easily attaches to toilet without tools or a plumber; includes all parts for easy installation. Three (3) year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
